entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5 with temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon then north 50 gusting to 70. High minus 5 with temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
